entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions: use constant indices when populating the span for a List<T> #71183
  • Enhance the Rename API to allow existing roslyn-internal features to work solely using the public API. #71177
  • An application of a CollectionBuilder attribute in source is not validated #71172

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34408.93 #71191
  • IDE0290 Primary Constructor should exclude possible error use cases(Compiler Error CS0103) #71167
  • Collection Initializer Expression `[]` should be disallowable per type (e.g. via Attribute?) #71171

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary check of trailing trivia for directives. #71185
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove navigation helpers based on line+offset #71184
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce size of source constructor symbol #71178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #71175
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure the editorconfig for code-style analysis ("IDExxxx") rules is included #71173
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add GetDeclaredSymbol overload for LocalFunctionStatementSyntax #71169
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [WIP] Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Convert type into a struct. #71181
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dead code from unit testing codepaths #71190
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify how data flows through the rename system. #71176
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add test for Use Collection Expression #71174
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we publish symbols for the BuildHost #71165
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' when moving attribute with reference to member in that type. #71168
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add QuickInfo for collection expression brackets #71161
    Area-IDE, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Skip the pack and publish steps in integration tests #71153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use aliases to lower the amount of large qualified namespaces emitted to distinguish internal and public types. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back request telemetry in CLaSP queue #71157
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Start local function analysis with captured variables marked "not null" #71148
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Update status/details on implicit indexers in object initializers #71164
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Make trivial Params Collections scenarios working end to end #71136
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
